<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Kitumu (Mother of Fireflies)](/Deities.aspx?ID=229)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 158 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

If any fervent devotees of the monstrous firefly goddess exist, they don't venture into civilization. The closest Kitumu has to servants or worshipers are those willing to placate the goddess in order to satisfy her demands and hungers.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** offer sacrifices to Kitumu, feed the hungers of nature with humanoid creatures

**Anathema** step on a firefly, kill those marked by Kitumu

**Area of Concern**
fireflies, flames

**Follower Alignments**
NE, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

**Favored Weapon** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)

**Domains** [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=8), [Indulgence](/Domains.aspx?ID=16), [Nightmares](/Domains.aspx?ID=23), [Swarm](/Domains.aspx?ID=53)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Sleep](/Spells.aspx?ID=288)

- **2nd**
[Vomit Swarm](/Spells.aspx?ID=726)

- **3rd**
[Insect Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=163)

</column>
